name: Heptrix 3D free
description:
Like the famous falling blocks game (Tetris) but with seven blocks each piece.

- Real 3D game.
- Use the buttons to move left,right,rotate and drop, or swipe left,right,up and down.
- Clear 7 lines to complete the level.
- Each piece landed give 7 points. Each line cleared 70 points and increase exponentially by the numbers of simultaneous lines.
